attributes.action: Introduce a fairer system and a financial support package for Grandparent carers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are many Granparents who step in to prevent their Grandchildren being placed into Local Authority Care. These Grandparents help Social Services in an endeavor to keep a vulnerable or abused child within a family unit. There is however, no financial assistance available for these Grandparent Carers. For instance if a working Grandparent steps in to help prevent their Grandchild going into care, they would either have to find huge childcare costs to stay in work, or give up work to care for the child. Working Grandparents, in most cases, do not qualify for legal aid either, and face huge legal expenses if parents decide to contest decisions when Grandparents seek parental responsibility. This system needs updating, and support provided to help these Grandparents, who are helping the government to keep children out of care. These Grandparents are saving the government huge costs in the Social Care sector, its time this money was shared with the people giving the saving.
